item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my website. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

This is the WPForms preview page. All your form previews will be handled on this page.

The page is set to private, so it is not publically accessible. Please do not delete this page :) .

item.title: NIVEA Sun Sosialisasikan Pentingnya Suncare untuk Menjaga Kesehatan Kulit Jangka Panjang
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Jakarta, 8 Maret 2017. Aktivitas di luar ruang membuat kulit membutuhkan perawatan yang tidak hanya melindungi kulit dari bahaya sinar matahari namun juga menjaga kelembaban kulit. Khususnya bagi mereka yang menyukai wisata luar ruang/outdoor, seperti mendaki gunung, liburan di pantai atau bahkan diving, penting untuk mengetahui bahwa paparan sinar matahari pada kulit secara langsung menyebabkan berbagai kondisi kulit, seperti kulit terbakar bahkan memicu risiko kanker kulit. Sejak diluncurkan tahun 1936, NIVEA Sun, secara konsisten memberikan perlindungan dan perawatan secara menyeluruh bagi kulit dari bahaya sinar matahari. Tahun ini, NIVEA Sun mensosialisasikan pentingnya suncare bagi mereka yang sering beraktivitas luar ruang, khususnya para traveler. Dukungan terhadap para traveler, juga dilakukan NIVEA Sun dalam bentuk partisipasi pada film “Labuan Hati” karya Lola Amaria yang akan tayang tanggal 6 April 2017.
Tomasz Schwarz, Marketing Director, PT Beiersdorf Indonesia, mengatakan, “NIVEA memahami bahwa Indonesia adalah negara tropis juga negara dengan potensi pariwisata yang luar biasa. Semakin sering kita lihat orang Indonesia yang sering traveling, baik untuk tujuan domestik maupun internasional. Tapi perlu diwaspadai bahaya yang timbul jika kulit sering terpapar sinar matahari secara langsung. Kami menciptakan NIVEA Sun pertama kalinya pada tahun 1936 yang membantu untuk melindungi para konsumen dari sinar UV. Sekarang, NIVEA Sun telah menjadi Suncare no.1 dunia, yang tidak hanya melindungi tetapi juga memelihara kulit agar tetap segar dan sehat.”
Dr. Srie Prihianti Gondokaryono, SpKK, PhD, FINSDV, FAADV, Sekretaris Umum dari Perhimpunan Dokter Spesialis Kulit dan Kelamin Indonesia (PERDOSKI) memaparkan, “Sinar matahari selain memiliki manfaat seperti membantu fotosintesa vitamin D3 dan meningkatkan mood, juga dapat menyebabkan kulit terbakar, kulit menggelap setelah terkena paparan sinar matahari, penuaan kulit, bahkan kanker kulit. Jika pernah mengalami kulit terbakar, maka seseorang akan memiliki risiko terkena kanker kulit 2x lebih besar. Sehingga perlindungan dari sinar matahari sangat penting.”
Dua faktor utama yang mempengaruhi perlindungan kulit dari sinar tabir surya adalah Sun Protection Factor (SPF) dan Protection Against UVA (PA). SPF dapat melindungi kulit terhadap radiasi UVB yang menyebabkan kulit terbakar dan diukur dengan angka (contoh: SPF 30, SPF 50). Angka dari SPF bisa memperkirakan jangka waktu perlindungan bagi kulit, SPF yang lebih tinggi bisa melindungi kulit dari sinar UV lebih lama. Sedangkan PA dapat melindungi kulit terhadap radiasi UVA yang menyebabkan kerusakan kulit yang lebih dalam dan diukur dengan tanda + (contoh: PA++, PA+++). Tanda + diartikan sebagai seberapa kuat kulit kita terlindung oleh UVA, dimana ‘+’ adalah 2x lebih kuat, “++” 4x lebih kuat dan “+++” 8x lebih kuat. Perlindungan yang disarankan bagi kulit Asia adalah PA++.
Lebih lanjut Dr Srie Prihianti menjelaskan, “Penggunaan suncare baik di dalam maupun luar ruangan sangat disarankan. Apalagi sinar matahari UVA dan UVB tidak kasat mata. Penting diketahui bahwa suncare yang mempunyai SPF lebih tinggi tidak menjamin perlindungan kulit sepanjang hari. SPF rendah atau tinggi menandakan berapa lama kita harus mengoleskan kembali dan tergantung juga dari jenis kulit serta kondisi lingkungan. Sebagai rekomendasinya, gunakan suncare dengan Aturan Sendok Teh (teaspoon rule), yaitu masing-masing 1 sendok teh di area wajah, leher dan tiap lengan. 2 sendok teh untuk area dada, punggung, dan tiap kaki. Ulangi penggunaan suncare tiap 2 jam sekali agar dapat maksimal memberikan perlindungan pada kulit. Berikan perawatan tambahan pasca terkena paparan sinar matahari, jika diperlukan. ”
NIVEA, brand ahli perawatan kulit wajah dan tubuh terkemuka di dunia, memiliki pengalaman merawat kulit selama lebih dari 100 tahun. NIVEA sebagai brand global mempunyai misi untuk terus berinovasi agar setiap individu merasa lebih nyaman dengan kulitnya setiap hari lewat berbagai varian produk perawatan kulit wajah dan tubuh, salah satunya adalah produk dari merek NIVEA Sun.
Panji Cakrasantana, Brand Manager NIVEA Sun, mengatakan, “Dalam mengaplikasikan suncare, kita harus mengetahui keunggulan dari produk tersebut selain mempunyai SPF dan PA yang tinggi. Produk NIVEA Sun tidak hanya melindungi kulit dari sinar tabir surya (UVA & UVB) dan tahan air, namun juga melembabkan kulit dengan Vitamin E, dan tidak lengket saat diaplikasikan.”
NIVEA Sun memberikan perlindungan terhadap sinar matahari dalam kegiatan sehari-hari maupun aktivitas khusus dalam varian produk yang beragam dengan kandungan dimulai dari SPF 20 hingga SPF 50+ dalam bentuk lotion, spray dan aerosol format. Untuk bisa memenuhi kebutuhan konsumen Indonesia, NIVEA Sun juga menyediakan rangkaian produk bagi anak-anak, wajah, tubuh serta produk yang dipakai untuk melembabkan kulit setelah berjemur.
Lebih lanjut Panji menyampaikan, “Tahun ini kami sangat senang dapat memberikan dukungan terhadap film produksi Indonesia yang mengangkat keindahan pariwisata Indonesia yaitu Labuan Hati, yang disutradarai dan diproduseri oleh Lola Amaria. Dalam film ini, NIVEA Sun membantu melindungi dan memelihara kulit para artis dan crew saat syuting film di Labuan Bajo, yang membuat mereka sering terpapar sinar matahari selama lebih dari 1 bulan di wilayah Indonesia timur yang panasnya sangat terik.”
Lola Amaria, Sutradara dan Produser Film Labuan Hati, mengatakan, “Dengan matahari yang terik dan panas, proses syuting film Labuan Hati di Labuan Bajo sangat terbantu oleh produk-produk NIVEA Sun yang melindungi para crew dan artis dari sinar matahari. Hampir sebagian besar proses produksi dilaksanakan di luar ruang. Sehingga peran suncare menjadi begitu penting.”
Terkait dengan dukungan NIVEA Sun untuk film Labuan Hati, NIVEA mengadakan program untuk konsumen yang akan mengajak konsumen melihat keindahan alam di Labuan Bajo seperti yang tergambar di film Labuan Hati, bersama dengan 2 pemeran utama dari film Labuan Hati yaitu Kelly Tandiono dan Ramon Tungka. Untuk mengetahui lebih jauh mengenai program konsumen, kunjungi www.NIVEA.co.id.

item.title: Hospitals Must Pay Attention to Fulfill Inpatient’s Nutritional Needs
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Nusa Dua – Bali, 2 March 2016 – Malnourished patients have become a common issue as it happens in both in developed and developing countries. However, the fulfillment of patient’s nutritional needs should have become the first priority as it drastically helps their recovery process, which in turn reduces hospital stay, improves patient’s life quality, and lowers treatment cost. Total medical is becoming a fundamental issue on the practice of national health insurance in most of the countries, including Indonesia with BPJS). The importance of nutritional therapy for patients will be covered and discussed in the 17th Fresenius Kabi Advanced Nutrition Course (FRANC) on Raising the Standard of Nutrition Therapy in 2017, held in Indonesia on 3rd – 4th March 2017.
Malnutrition is a condition in which the body lacks proper nutrients, having excess or imbalance amount of energy, protein, or other nutrients, causing measurable adverse effects on tissue/ body form and function, and clinical outcome. Malnutrition leads to decreased energy stores or improper nutritional absorption, often characterized by weight loss and changes in body composition which include loss of body fat, loss of lean mass, and a relative increase in extracellular fluid volume.
Prof. Jonathan Asprer – Professor of Surgery, University of Santo Tomas and Medical Director Fresenius Kabi in his speech, stated, “Malnutrition cases at hospitals has gone up 30-50% , with more than 70% patients were left unidentified as medical personnel have little to no knowledge on how the importance of understanding patient’s nutritional status . This encourages us to hold FRANC Asia to invite the public, government, and medical personnel to understand nutritional therapy for patients.”
DR. dr Ike Sri redjeki, SpAN KIC, KMN, M.Kes, Representative from Indonesian Society of Parenteral and Enteral Nutrition (INASPEN) said, “Malnutrition leads to various consequences such as extended hospital stay, higher morbidity, increase the needs on more intensive therapy with high risk of complication, healing wound problem, and high theraphy cost, compared to patient with better nutrition status with the same disease.”
Malnutrition is caused by a number of factors such as digestion problem that lead to nutrition malabsorption, maldigestion, inadequate food intake (inability to eat by themselves, poor dental condition, social / financial problem) or it may caused by increased energy need due to chronic diseases, consuming diseases (e.g. malignancy), liver disease, hyperthyroidism, and other endocrine disorders.
Other factors tthat increase malnutrition is elderly, 65 years old and older, patients with long-term illness such as diabetes, kidney disorder, and chronic lung disease, chronic progressive disease such as cancer, and drug users.
DR. dr Ike Sri redjeki, SpAN KIC, KMN, M.Kes furthermore explained, “If malnutrion is treated correctly so patient will have a better nutrition status, then he will see health improvements such as less complications with less infections, improved wound healing. It also increased patient mobilization and reduced length of hospital stay. Number of re-hospitalizations is also reduce with increase quality of life and better survival.
Prof. dr. H. Abdul Kadir, PhD., SpTHT-KL(K), MARS, Chairman of Indonesia’s Vertical Hosiptal Association said, “Understanding the malnutrition situation in hospitals especially for inpatient, therefore it is very important to understand a patient’s nutritional needs by measuring and supervising their nutritional condition, food intake, nutritional status. We attempt to assure medical personnel in government’s vertical hospital that nutritional therapy is as important as any other medical treatments. We suggest hospitals to improve their medical personnel’s capability to improve the standards of patient’s nutritional screening. Nutritional therapy is very cost efficiency; patient who recovers quickly means lower treatment cost.”
Dr. Ian Kloer SKM, Director of Medical Device & Marketing Unit Indonesia – Fresenius Kabi Indonesia said, “As a health conscious company, Fresenius Kabi sees mall nutrition as everyone’s responsibility. Because of that, we support recommendation on the importance of malnutrition theraphy at early stage. Fresenius Kabi has consistently cooperated with medical professional organizations to inform them about the facts and the importance of nutritional therapy and providing appropriate solutions for patients according to their needs and condition. With the inclusion of some o nutritional therapy products from Fresenius Kabi to health e-catalogue, we show our support in providing health access to patient of health facility on nutrition theraphy.

item.title: Deal With Your Anger
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Anger usually considered a negative emotion that we should do our best to eliminate. It seemed an appropriate response to injustice, one that does little harm to oneself psychologically and very well may even be beneficial in that it motivates action to rights wrongs.  You can deal with anger in yourself. Not by ignoring or suppressing it.  Once anger rises past a certain point, it seems to require satisfactory expression to be diffused. That is, it must be expelled in a way that feels good in a way that is literally emptying. How one does this depends on why the anger one feels is rising in the first place. First anger aimed at harming oneself. Depression is almost certainly the cause and should be identified and treated. Anger also aimed at achieving control. Ask yourself why you feel out of control. Fear is a common reason. Actually lacking control is another. Anger is, fortunately or unfortunately, often a good strategy to regain control in the short-term, and easier to feel than many of the emotions that trigger it. Anger may arise for more than one of these reasons at one time. Then when you can deal with anger in yourself, you can diffuse anger in others. First of all you need to remain in control of yourself. When you find yourself on the receiving end of someone’s anger, they’re either trying to control you in some way or make you feel small so they can feel big. You must tell yourself that anger is their strategy and has nothing to do with you at all, unless of course you really have committed an injustice against them, in which case you should make amends. Help them discharge their anger in a way that feels satisfying without causing harm. Responding to anger with anger rarely accomplishes anything positive, validate their anger. Resisting a person’s anger, getting angry back at them, denying that their anger is justified all do nothing more than inflame it. Even if their anger isn’t justified in your mind, what would convincing them of that accomplish? It likely wouldn’t give them control over it. Feelings require no justification to be felt. Once you can manage the anger in yourself and others, you can deal with it anytime.

item.title: Communication Strategy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
When you meet someone new, they want you to tell them your story. Very few people and brands know how to do this well.
A thoughtfully developed communication strategy, built on insight and intelligence, builds your story and determines how and when you will engage with your target audiences to tell it.
We also help clients who have been telling the wrong story or dealing with reputational issues to reshape their identity and deliver an accurate, powerful and profitable message.
At the heart of our communication strategy offering is <u>Musin & Lawson’s 360</u> process. We work with you over an intense one- to three-day workshop to define or refine your mission, vision, communication strategy and story. We intelligently identify the opportunities and challenges that stand between you and your desired future goals, and present you with a comprehensive strategy that ensures that you get where you need to go.

item.title: Media Relations & Publicity
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
With an outstanding knowledge of Indonesian media and international experience Musin & Lawson can help tell the world your stories. Our staff include former journalists and Indonesian media identity Ahmad Rieva Muchsin, who can represent you and ensure your news is perfectly crafted and distributed. We offer:  
  • Media ideas, strategies and plans
  • Press release writing and distribution
  • Media enquiry handling and response
  • Relationship building with national and regional press contacts to ensure your company’s reputation is promoted and criticism deflected
  • Researching and writing of briefing materials
  • Creative drafting of executive speeches
  • Media coverage monitoring and evaluation.

item.title: Market Entry Consultancy
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
With decades of experience introducing new products into the market in Indonesia and Australia, the Musin & Lawson team can help your business successfully launch its local brand and operations. We have worked with global companies including Chrysler, Jeep, Fiat, Puma Energy and Air BP to generate publicity, relationships and acceptance in Indonesia and Australia. Our senior team members have the connections, experience and knowledge to ensure that you have a local partner on your side.   Our senior staff deliver:
  • Expert advice on doing business in Indonesia for overseas companies
  • Publicity, marketing communications, VIP introductions, stakeholder relations, events and launches in Jakarta, Surabaya, Medan and Bali
  • Expert advice and assistance for Indonesian companies doing business in Australia
Publicity, marketing communications, government relations, stakeholder relations and events in Sydney, Melbourne, Perth and Brisbane.

item.title: Issues & Crisis Management
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
When the unexpected happens and your brand is facing reputational damage, Musin & Lawson can help.   We work with clients to develop public relations, risk and crisis management strategies to avoid, resolve, and minimise the impact of, serious reputational events including accidents, disputes, product recalls, crime and investigations.   When issues involve the news media, Musin & Lawson represents our clients in interactions with journalists by telling your story – preparing responses, handling enquiries and organising interviews. We work with our clients to ensure the crisis spokesperson is well-briefed and comfortable interacting with the media in challenging circumstances.   Our services include:  
  • Pre-emptive risk analysis
  • Issues identification
  • Risk mitigation advice
  • Crisis planning
  • On-call crisis support
  • Media relations
  • Executive media and crisis training.

item.title: Social Media Management
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Social media is changing every day and requires specific expertise to understand how to keep up and use your digital profile for commercial and reputational return.   Musin & Lawson can build and maintain the right strategy to tell your story, manage your reputation, and monetise your participation in social media by growing your reputation, product desirability, and sales.   Musin & Lawson Communications understands how each social media channel works, how it can be used to enhance the reputation of individuals or companies, and how to optimize content so that it is engaging and leads to sales.   On your behalf Musin & Lawson team can establish new social media profiles, build communities and follower numbers, post engaging content, and handle enquiries or respond to conversations.   We can:
  • Build and execute your social media strategy by undertaking competitive research, platform determination, benchmarking, messaging and audience identification
  • Develop your social media content and post pictures, videos and stories
  • Link your social media to your online sales platforms
  • Grow your follower and customer numbers
  • Work with influencers who can promote your content and products
Generate and share content that builds meaningful connections.

item.title: VIP Representation
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
If you are an individual who is looking to build or maintain a high-profile personal brand, Musin & Lawson can assist you.   Musin & Lawson works with a limited number of select individuals to build their profiles across platforms including magazine social pages, exclusive events, social media, speaking engagements, and newspaper and magazine publicity.   We can organise events, venues, guests and publicity, as well as private shopping experiences, tickets to launch events and parties, and relationships with elite luxury brands.   Our clients have included an individual who engaged Musin & Lawson to negotiate and organise a private fashion show in Jakarta by one of the world’s most high-profile fashion houses.   As your VIP representative, Musin & Lawson works on a monthly retainer basis (for a minimum of 12 months) to:
  • Advise you on your appearance and personal style – we ensure you look fabulous
  • Deliver public speaking or media training, as required
  • Provide you with access to exclusive event invitations, introductions and shopping experiences
  • Organise events, parties and profiling opportunities
  • Generate magazine and newspaper profiling opportunities
  • Manage your digital profile, including websites, social media, and reviews
  • Monitor and track publicity and commentary about you, responding on your behalf when needed.

item.title: Executive Training
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: To be written (Margaret)

item.title: Branding & Websites
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Your brand is the public face of your organisation and your website or social media provide a critical first impression. These channels must tell your story powerfully and authentically.
Musin & Lawson works with new companies to understand your vision and goals and develop a corporate story, logo, brand style, photography and online presence that accurately represents you. For existing companies, we can work with you to understand where your brand needs improvement. Whether you need to freshen up your look and story, or completely overhaul your entire identity, we will use our insight and experience to guide you smoothly through the process. We offer the following services:
  • Market and audience research and insight
  • Communication strategies and plans
  • Brand strategy for new companies and products entering Indonesia
  • Logo, name and brand design
  • Website strategy, design, copywriting and development
  • Corporate photo shoots
Brand strategy for Indonesian companies and products entering Australia.

item.title: Brand dan Website
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Indonesia Your brand is the public face of your organisation and your website or social media provide a critical first impression. These channels must tell your story powerfully and authentically.
  Musin & Lawson works with new companies to understand your vision and goals and develop a corporate story, logo, brand style, photography and online presence that accurately represents you.     For existing companies, we can work with you to understand where your brand needs improvement. Whether you need to freshen up your look and story, or completely overhaul your entire identity, we will use our insight and experience to guide you smoothly through the process.   We offer the following services:  
  • Market and audience research and insight
  • Communication strategies and plans
  • Brand strategy for new companies and products entering Indonesia
  • Logo, name and brand design

Brand strategy for Indonesian companies and products entering Australia.

item.title: Bersepakat dengan Emosi Anda
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Anger usually considered a negative emotion that we should do our best to eliminate. It seemed an appropriate response to injustice, one that does little harm to oneself psychologically and very well may even be beneficial in that it motivates action to rights wrongs.  You can deal with anger in yourself. Not by ignoring or suppressing it.  Once anger rises past a certain point, it seems to require satisfactory expression to be diffused. That is, it must be expelled in a way that feels good in a way that is literally emptying. How one does this depends on why the anger one feels is rising in the first place. First anger aimed at harming oneself. Depression is almost certainly the cause and should be identified and treated. Anger also aimed at achieving control. Ask yourself why you feel out of control. Fear is a common reason. Actually lacking control is another. Anger is, fortunately or unfortunately, often a good strategy to regain control in the short-term, and easier to feel than many of the emotions that trigger it. Anger may arise for more than one of these reasons at one time. Then when you can deal with anger in yourself, you can diffuse anger in others. First of all you need to remain in control of yourself. When you find yourself on the receiving end of someone’s anger, they’re either trying to control you in some way or make you feel small so they can feel big. You must tell yourself that anger is their strategy and has nothing to do with you at all, unless of course you really have committed an injustice against them, in which case you should make amends. Help them discharge their anger in a way that feels satisfying without causing harm. Responding to anger with anger rarely accomplishes anything positive, validate their anger. Resisting a person’s anger, getting angry back at them, denying that their anger is justified all do nothing more than inflame it. Even if their anger isn’t justified in your mind, what would convincing them of that accomplish? It likely wouldn’t give them control over it. Feelings require no justification to be felt. Once you can manage the anger in yourself and others, you can deal with it anytime.

item.title: Rumah Sakit Harus Memperhatikan Penuhi Kebutuhan Gizi Rawat Inap ini
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Nusa Dua - Bali, 2 Maret 2016 - pasien malnutrisi telah menjadi masalah umum seperti yang terjadi di kedua di negara maju dan berkembang. Namun, pemenuhan kebutuhan nutrisi pasien seharusnya menjadi prioritas pertama karena secara drastis membantu proses pemulihan mereka, yang pada gilirannya mengurangi tinggal di rumah sakit, meningkatkan kualitas hidup pasien, dan menurunkan biaya perawatan. Total medis menjadi masalah mendasar pada praktek asuransi kesehatan nasional di sebagian besar negara, termasuk Indonesia dengan BPJS). Pentingnya terapi nutrisi untuk pasien akan dibahas dan didiskusikan di 17 Fresenius Kabi Lanjutan Nutrisi Kursus (Franc) tentang Raising Standard of Nutrition Therapy pada 2017, yang diselenggarakan di Indonesia pada 03-04 Maret 2017.
Malnutrisi adalah suatu kondisi di mana tubuh kekurangan nutrisi yang tepat, memiliki jumlah kelebihan atau ketidakseimbangan energi, protein, atau nutrisi lainnya, menyebabkan efek samping yang terukur pada jaringan bentuk / tubuh dan fungsi, dan hasil klinis. Malnutrisi menyebabkan penurunan toko energi atau penyerapan nutrisi yang tidak tepat, sering ditandai dengan penurunan berat badan dan perubahan komposisi tubuh yang meliputi hilangnya lemak tubuh, hilangnya massa ramping, dan peningkatan relatif dalam volume cairan ekstraseluler.
Prof Jonathan Asprer - Profesor Bedah, University of Santo Tomas dan Direktur Medis Fresenius Kabi dalam sambutannya, menyatakan, "kasus Malnutrisi di rumah sakit sudah naik 30-50%, dengan lebih dari 70% pasien yang tersisa tak dikenal sebagai memiliki tenaga medis sedikit atau tidak ada pengetahuan tentang bagaimana pentingnya memahami status gizi pasien. Hal ini mendorong kita untuk terus Franc Asia untuk mengundang masyarakat, pemerintah, dan tenaga medis untuk memahami terapi nutrisi bagi pasien. "
DR. dr Ike Sri Redjeki, SpAN KIC, KMN, M.Kes, Wakil dari Indonesia Society of parenteral dan Nutrisi Enternal (INASPEN) mengatakan, "Malnutrisi menyebabkan berbagai konsekuensi seperti tinggal di rumah sakit diperpanjang, morbiditas yang lebih tinggi, meningkatkan kebutuhan terapi yang lebih intensif dengan risiko tinggi komplikasi, penyembuhan masalah luka, dan biaya terapi yang tinggi, dibandingkan dengan pasien dengan status gizi yang lebih baik dengan penyakit yang sama. "
Malnutrisi disebabkan oleh sejumlah faktor seperti masalah pencernaan yang menyebabkan malabsorpsi nutrisi, pencernaan yang buruk, kurangnya asupan makanan (ketidakmampuan untuk makan sendiri, kondisi gigi yang buruk, masalah sosial / keuangan) atau mungkin disebabkan oleh peningkatan kebutuhan energi akibat kronis penyakit, mengkonsumsi penyakit (misalnya keganasan), penyakit hati, hipertiroid, dan gangguan endokrin lainnya.
Faktor-faktor lain tthat meningkatkan gizi buruk adalah orang tua, berusia 65 tahun dan lebih tua, pasien dengan penyakit jangka panjang seperti diabetes, gangguan ginjal, dan penyakit paru-paru kronis, penyakit progresif kronis seperti kanker, dan pengguna narkoba.
DR. dr Ike Sri Redjeki, SpAN KIC, KMN, M.Kes lebih jauh menjelaskan, "Jika kekurangan gizi diperlakukan dengan benar sehingga pasien akan memiliki status gizi yang lebih baik, maka dia akan melihat perbaikan kesehatan seperti kurang komplikasi dengan infeksi kurang, meningkatkan penyembuhan luka. Hal tersebut juga meningkatkan mobilisasi pasien dan lama tinggal di rumah sakit berkurang. Jumlah re-rawat inap juga mengurangi dengan kualitas peningkatan kehidupan dan kelangsungan hidup yang lebih baik.
Prof. dr. H. Abdul Kadir, PhD., SpTHT-KL (K), MARS, Ketua Hosiptal Asosiasi Vertikal Indonesia mengatakan, "Memahami situasi kekurangan gizi di rumah sakit terutama untuk rawat inap, oleh karena itu sangat penting untuk memahami kebutuhan nutrisi pasien dengan mengukur dan mengawasi kondisi gizi mereka, asupan makanan, status gizi. Kami berusaha untuk menjamin tenaga medis di rumah sakit vertikal pemerintah bahwa terapi nutrisi adalah sama pentingnya dengan perawatan medis lainnya. Kami menyarankan rumah sakit untuk meningkatkan kemampuan tenaga medis mereka untuk meningkatkan standar screening gizi pasien. Terapi nutrisi adalah efisiensi biaya yang sangat; pasien yang pulih dengan cepat berarti biaya perawatan yang lebih rendah. "
Dr Ian Kloer SKM, Direktur Alat Kesehatan & Satuan Pemasaran Indonesia - Fresenius Kabi Indonesia mengatakan, "Sebagai perusahaan yang sadar kesehatan, Fresenius Kabi melihat gizi mal sebagai tanggung jawab semua orang. Karena itu, kami mendukung rekomendasi tentang pentingnya gizi buruk theraphy pada tahap awal. Fresenius Kabi telah secara konsisten bekerja sama dengan organisasi profesional medis untuk memberitahu mereka tentang fakta-fakta dan pentingnya terapi nutrisi dan memberikan solusi yang tepat untuk pasien sesuai dengan kebutuhan dan kondisi mereka. Dengan masuknya beberapa o produk terapi nutrisi dari Fresenius Kabi kesehatan e-katalog, kami menunjukkan dukungan kami dalam menyediakan akses kesehatan kepada pasien dari fasilitas kesehatan pada terapi gizi.

item.title: NIVEA Sun Sosialisasikan Pentingnya Suncare untuk Menjaga Kesehatan Kulit Jangka Panjang

item.title: Indonesia
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Musin & Lawson Communication
PT. Musin Lawson Komunikasi
Equity Tower, 49<sup>th</sup> Floor
Jl. Jenderal Sudirman Kavling 52-53 (SCBD)
Jakarta 12190
Indonesia
Phone: +62 21 2555 5700 (Number to change)
[locations id="143" show_phone="0" show_fax="0" show_email="0" show_info="0" show_map="1" show_location_image="1"]

item.title: Who We Are
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Musin & Lawson is an integrated public relations firm in Jakarta, Indonesia that delivers outstanding marketing, media, and business development campaigns to empower our clients to achieve their goals.
We combine an in-depth understanding of the Indonesian market with decades of international communication experience across industries including aviation, energy, petroleum, automotive, property, healthcare, and lifestyle.
Musin & Lawson works with ambitious clients who strive to have meaningful, powerful conversations with the right people, at the right time, using the right channels. Let us tell your story.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: The world today revolves around authentic conversations and stories. Who is telling yours?

item.title: Siapa Kami
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Musin & Lawson adalah sebuah perusahaan public relations terpadu di Jakarta, Indonesia yang memberikan pemasaran, media, dan kampanye pengembangan bisnis yang luar biasa untuk memberdayakan klien kami untuk mencapai tujuan mereka.
Kami menggabungkan pemahaman mendalam tentang pasar Indonesia dengan puluhan tahun pengalaman komunikasi internasional di industri termasuk penerbangan, energi, minyak bumi, otomotif, properti, kesehatan, dan gaya hidup.
Musin & Lawson bekerja dengan klien yang ambisius yang berusaha untuk memiliki bermakna, percakapan yang kuat dengan orang yang tepat, pada waktu yang tepat, menggunakan saluran yang tepat. Mari kita menceritakan kisah Anda.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Dunia saat ini berkisar percakapan sekitar otentik dan cerita. Siapa yang mengatakan Anda?

item.title: Engaging Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
No one understands your business as well as you do, but sometimes you need someone from the outside to make your story resonate with the world. Musin & Lawson works with clients to deliver:
  • Special projects: Many of our long-term relationships start as short projects where we develop a strategy, deliver executive training, manage brand and web development, or deal with an immediate reputational issue. Special projects typically run for one to three months.
  • Ongoing support: We can work with you, year-in and year-out, as a trusted part of your team that supports your brand, promotes you to the media, manages your digital assets, and helps you achieve your long-term goals. Our six- to 24-month engagements for major, ongoing projects usually start with us implementing Musin & Lawson’s 360 strategy process, and continue for at least six months, depending on your needs.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Musin & Lawson builds long-term relationships with our clients by getting to know your business, understanding your goals and creating communications that help you reach them.

item.title: Hubungi Kami
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Tidak ada yang mengerti bisnis Anda serta Anda lakukan, tapi kadang-kadang Anda membutuhkan seseorang dari luar untuk membuat cerita Anda beresonansi dengan dunia. Musin & Lawson bekerja dengan klien untuk memberikan:
  • proyek khusus: Banyak hubungan jangka panjang kami memulai proyek-proyek seperti pendek di mana kita mengembangkan strategi, memberikan pelatihan eksekutif, mengelola merek dan web pengembangan, atau berurusan dengan masalah reputasi segera. proyek khusus biasanya berlangsung selama satu sampai tiga bulan.
  • dukungan berkelanjutan: Kita dapat bekerja dengan Anda, tahun-in dan tahun-out, sebagai bagian terbesar dari tim Anda yang mendukung merek Anda, mempromosikan Anda ke media, mengelola aset digital Anda, dan membantu Anda mencapai tujuan jangka panjang Anda . enam untuk keterlibatan 24-bulan untuk utama, proyek yang sedang berlangsung biasanya mulai dengan kami menerapkan Musin & Lawson proses strategi 360, dan berlanjut selama setidaknya enam bulan, tergantung pada kebutuhan Anda.

wp:postmeta.wp:meta_value: Musin & Lawson membangun hubungan jangka panjang dengan klien kami dengan mengenal bisnis Anda, memahami tujuan dan menciptakan komunikasi yang membantu Anda menjangkau mereka
